title: V1 RMS Dashboard Response Documentation
description: Comprehensive documentation of the RMS (Rental Management System) Dashboard API response structure

simple_summary.what_is_this: هذا الملف يحتوي على شرح مفصل لاستجابة API لوحة تحكم نظام إدارة الإيجارات
simple_summary.main_purpose: يوفر جميع البيانات المطلوبة لعرض لوحة تحكم شاملة لإدارة العقارات والإيجارات
key_data_included: إحصائيات العقود (العقود النشطة، المنتهية، القادمة على الانتهاء)
simple_summary.data_structure: البيانات منظمة في كائن JSON رئيسي يحتوي على عدة أقسام فرعية
simple_summary.usage: يستخدم هذا الـ API لعرض لوحة تحكم شاملة لإدارة العقارات والإيجارات
simple_summary.response_size: استجابة كبيرة تحتوي على آلاف الأسطر من البيانات التفصيلية

quick_overview.data_period: بيانات لسنة 2025 مع تفاصيل شهرية وربعية

status.description: Indicates if the API request was successful

data.description: Main data container for all dashboard information

range_days.description: Number of days for the dashboard data range

counts.description: Summary counts for various rental management metrics

ongoing_rentals.description: Number of currently active rental agreements

expiring_contracts_next_7d.description: Contracts expiring within the next 7 days

expiring_contracts_current_month.description: Contracts expiring in the current month

expiring_contracts_next_month.description: Contracts expiring in the next month

payments_due_next_7d.description: Payments due within the next 7 days

payments_due_current_month.description: Payments due in the current month

payments_due_next_month.description: Payments due in the next month

maintenance_in_progress.description: Number of maintenance requests in progress

total_properties.description: Total number of properties in the portfolio

available_properties.description: Number of properties available for rent

occupancy_rate.description: Percentage of properties that are occupied

average_contract_duration_days.description: Average duration of contracts in days

expiring_current_month.description: Contracts expiring in current month details

expiring_next_month.description: Contracts expiring in next month details

total_expected.description: Total expected amount for the month

late_but_paid.description: Amount paid late but still paid

pending_not_due.description: Amount pending but not yet due

total_expected.description: Total expected amount for the month

earliest_due_date.description: Earliest payment due date in the month

latest_due_date.description: Latest payment due date in the month

all_due_dates.description: Array of all due dates in the month

currency.description: Currency code for all monetary values

yearly_overview.description: Yearly overview of rental management data

total_expected.description: Total expected revenue for the year

total_collected.description: Total amount collected for the year

total_pending.description: Total amount pending for the year

total_overdue.description: Total overdue amount for the year

monthly_breakdown.description: Monthly breakdown of collections for the year

months.description: Array of month numbers in the quarter

ongoing_rentals.description: List of all ongoing rental agreements

payments_due_next_month_details.description: Detailed information about payments due next month

payments_due_current_month_details.description: Detailed information about payments due in current month

days_remaining.description: Days remaining until due date (negative if overdue)

expiring_contracts_current_month_details.description: Detailed information about contracts expiring in current month

expiring_contracts_next_month_details.description: Detailed information about contracts expiring in next month

user_id.description: User ID who created the reminder

entity_type.description: Type of entity the reminder is for

user_id.description: User ID who created the request

description.example: The AC in bedroom A-12 is not cooling properly.

payer_share_percent.description: Percentage of cost paid by the payer

dashboard_overview.description: Get a quick overview of rental management status
dashboard_overview.response_usage: Use the 'counts' object to display key metrics on the dashboard

property_management.response_usage: Use 'property_stats' to show occupancy rates and property counts

tenant_management.response_usage: Use 'ongoing_rentals' to display active tenant information

maintenance_management.response_usage: Use 'maintenance' array to display open maintenance requests

rental_agreements.description: Core entity linking tenants, properties, and contracts

payments.description: Financial transactions linked to rental agreements

contracts.description: Legal agreements with start/end dates and status

common_use_cases.description: Display key metrics and statistics on the main dashboard
Generate financial reports and collection analysis
Manage active tenants and their information

notes.currency: All monetary values are in SAR (Saudi Riyal)
notes.date_formats: Dates are in ISO 8601 format with UTC timezone
notes.null_values: Some fields may be null if data is not available
notes.array_structures: Most detailed data is provided in arrays for easy iteration
